values: （因疾病、痛苦、悲伤等）受难；受苦；受折磨；经受；遭受；蒙受（坏事）；变差；变糟；<古>容许；允许；<古>受处决

synonym.mean: 遭受，忍受；受痛苦；经验；受损害

sample.mean: n. 后缀；词尾
v. 授予；商议；协商；讨论；交流意见
v. 不同；相异；意见不同
v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚
v. 提供；给予
v. 更喜爱；宁可；偏爱；提出；举报；提拔；提升
v. 提到；谈到；指；提交…做出决定；进行处理；把…归因于；淘汰；参考；查阅；让…注意
v. 转移；转乘；转搭；转让；移交；转变；调动；改行

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可忍耐的；可容忍的；可忍受得了的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指因具有一定实力、权力或能力而能忍受某种情况。
指以自我克制的态度，对待令人反感或厌恶的东西，含默认宽容意味。
口语用词，常可与hear换用，但前者侧重指经受得起，后者强调容忍，是普通用语。
书面用词，指长时间忍受痛苦和不幸，着重体力或意志力的坚强不屈服。
通常指非自愿或被迫忍受各种痛苦、困难或不快，强调受到苦难。
指忍受长期的痛苦或折磨，强调耐心和屈从。多用于否定句和疑问句中。
指遭受痛苦或承受负担。
多指经受艰难、痛苦、不愉快或危险等事。
常可与sustain通用，尤指受到损害或伤害。
指亲身经受或体验某事。

word_group.brief_definition: 对蠢人没有耐心；无法忍受蠢人
默默受苦；默默忍受；默默承受
遭受死亡；丧命；经历死亡
遭受惩罚；受到惩罚；受罚
遭殃；遭受灾难；遭受灾祸；遭难
吃亏；遭受不幸；遭遇不幸

bilingual.source: There is a danger that we can suffer from information overload.
bilingual.target: 我们有可能会遭受信息过载的危险。

bilingual.source: The children in the village suffer from hunger.
bilingual.target: 村里的孩子们遭受着饥饿。

bilingual.source: The elderly often suffer from stiff joints.
bilingual.target: 老年人经常遭受关节僵硬的困扰。

bilingual.source: Many people suffer from various ills in their lives.
bilingual.target: 许多人在生活中遭受各种不幸。

bilingual.source: He doesn't want to suffer the consequences of his actions.
bilingual.target: 他不想遭受自己行为的后果。

bilingual.source: The town continues to suffer from frequent power outages.
bilingual.target: 这个小镇继续遭受频繁的停电。

bilingual.source: Many people suffer from allergies during the spring season.
bilingual.target: 许多人在春季遭受过敏的困扰。

bilingual.source: She had to suffer through a long and boring meeting.
bilingual.target: 她不得不遭受一场漫长而无聊的会议。

bilingual.source: Many children in impoverished areas suffer from undernutrition.
bilingual.target: 许多贫困地区的儿童都遭受营养不良。

bilingual.source: Many children in the city suffer from underprivilege.
bilingual.target: 这座城市的许多孩子都遭受着社会或经济上的劣势。

list.abstract: Suffer（英[ˈsʌfə(r)]，美[ˈsʌfər]），英文单词，动词，意思为受苦；经受；变差。短语搭配有suffer from（遭受）。例句为“They suffer a great deal from ill health.（他们饱受不健康之苦）”。 Suffer及物动词类近义词有stomach、stand等，不及物动词类近义词有stomach、come under等。名词为suffering。sufferer意为患者，受害者。
收录于美国男歌手charlie puth的首张EP《Some Type Of Love》于2015年5月1日通过大西洋唱片发行

yingyinNormal.en: I think nowadays, we don't just hide ourselves from the hard truth, and shut our eyes to the inequities, but we suffer from the tyranny of low expectations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为，现如今，我们并不只是假装没看到真相，并对不平等视而不见。我们还在遭受低预期的践踏。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: This kind of experience happens to everyone. It will happen to you. You will lose something, or someone you think you can't live without. Or you will suffer a terrible illness or injury, or your career will fall apart before your eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有人能幸免这种事。它会发生在你身上。你会失去一切失去不能失去的人。或者会遭受严重的疾病或伤害，或者眼见着自己的职业生涯分崩离析。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want your schoolwork to suffer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想让你的学业受到影响。

yingyinNormal.en: Those who suffer a loss, requires support from friends and loved ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 痛失所爱的人，需要获得朋友和爱人的帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: I am almost tempted to let you take it, if only to see Oakenshield suffer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我差点动心，让你拿走宝钻，好让橡木盾受折磨。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm afraid in order to escape this place, you will need to suffer more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐怕要逃离这个地方，你需要承受更多苦难折磨。

yingyinNormal.en: What's she like? She doesn't suffer fools and she doesn't give second chances.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她什么样？她不忍受愚蠢，也不给人第二次机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be a fool. Why suffer an horrific death when you can join me and live? Never!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别犯傻了，干嘛要忍受痛苦的惨死呢？你可以投靠我，留条命。休想。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not frightened. I'm not frightened of anything. The more I suffer, the more I love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不畏惧。我无所畏惧。受伤越深，我的爱也越炽热。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's not. I know it's not. I'm so sorry. See, I suffer from short-term memory loss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不是的，我知道那不是玩笑。对不起，看，我有短期失忆症。

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you doing this? You know the rules. You brought your mom to work, you must suffer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么这么做？你知道游戏规则，你带母亲来上班就等着受罪吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And anyone who stands in our way will suffer the same fate as these men you see before you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 任何阻挡我们的人类，下场都会和你们面前看到的这些人一样。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a girlfriend. So? So my work would suffer, too, if I was getting laid all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有个女朋友，所以呢换我的话，专业水平也会降低，谁叫你每天巫山云雨乐不思蜀呢。

yingyinNormal.en: For I have sprung you from life's cruel dungeon, and hereby grant you liberty. Suffer no more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我已经把你们从那个地牢里救了出来，给你们自由了！你们的痛苦结束了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, we should share our bonuses. There's no reason I should suffer for helping out the whole team.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我们的奖金应该共享，没理由为了集体牺牲我一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'm a Hindu. My religion teaches that if we suffer in this life we are rewarded in the next.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是印度人嘛，我的信仰告诉我，今生的苦难来世将转为福音。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no. I'm sorry. I suffer from short-term memory loss. You don't remember what we were talking about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，我得了短期失忆症。你不记得我们刚刚说了些什么？

yingyinNormal.en: But predators shouldn't suffer because of my mistakes. I have to fix this. But I can't do it without you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但食肉动物不该因为我的过失而受苦，我得弥补自己犯的错，但是没有你，我办不成。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm really sorry they took Sheldon's spot away. He shouldn't have to suffer just because Howard's such a big deal now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很抱歉，学校收回谢尔顿的车位，他不该因为霍华德现在是个大咖，而蒙受苦难啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there are studies that suggest that many who go into the performing arts suffer from an external locus of identity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有研究表明很多从事演艺事业的人都受外界认同的煎熬。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: experience or be subjected to something bad or unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: Those who have been worst affected by industrial action should receive compensation for the disruption they have <highlight>suffered</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些受劳工行动影响最严重的人，应该为其所遭受的扰乱得到补偿。

examination_example.sentence: The TSA cannot continue diverting resources into underused PreCheck lanes while most of the traveling public <highlight>suffers</highlight> in unnecessary lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当大对数出行的公众正在忍受着没有必要的排队时，美国运输安全局不能再继续将资源转移到未被充分利用的预检通道上了。

examination_example.sentence: But many within the public sector <highlight>suffer</highlight> under the current system, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在当前的体制下，许多公共部门的人也深受其害。

sense_info_list.en: put up with something or somebody unpleasant

v. 授予；商议；协商；讨论；交流意见

word_usage.usage:
suffer既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，常接表示不吉利的名词（如痛苦、失败、惩罚等），如：suffer a heart attack；也可用于被动结构；
作不及物动词时，常与介词from, for, by等连用，如：suffer from shock

exam_freq_info.chinese: 遭受(痛苦); 经历(坏事)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: experience or be subjected to something bad or unpleasant
sense_info_list.zh: 遭受(痛苦); 经历(坏事)

examination_example.sentence: In the past 12 months, Nigeria has <highlight>suffered</highlight> from a shrinking economy, a sliding currency, and a prolonged fuel shortage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的12个月中，尼日利亚(Nigeria)饱受经济萎缩、货币贬值及长期燃料短缺的困扰。

examination_example.sentence: The most climate-vulnerable countries in the world have contributed very little to creating the global disease from which they now <highlight>suffer</highlight> the most.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上最易受气候变化影响的国家很少会引发全球疾病，但这些国家现在受到的伤害却最大。

examination_example.sentence: A quarter of students report that their use of digital devices during class causes their grades to <highlight>suffer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四分之一的学生认为，他们在上课时使用数字设备导致他们的成绩受到影响。

sense_info_list.en: put up with something or somebody unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: By taking upon the role of adviser rather than decision maker, one does not <highlight>suffer</highlight> the consequences of decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过扮演顾问而非决策者的角色，一个人不会承受做决定的后果。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 遭受(痛苦); 经历(坏事); 受折磨

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: experience or be subjected to something bad or unpleasant
sense_info_list.zh: 遭受(痛苦); 经历(坏事); 受折磨

examination_example.sentence: A recent study found that 10 percent of British children <highlight>suffer</highlight> from math anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究发现，10%的英国儿童患有数学焦虑症。

examination_example.sentence: All in all, the Olympic class ships were marvels of sea engineering, but they seemed cursed to <highlight>suffer</highlight> disastrous fates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，奥林匹克级邮船是航海工程的奇迹，但它们似乎受到了诅咒，都遭到了灾难性的命运。

examination_example.sentence: The Olympic <highlight>suffered</highlight> two crashes with other ships and went on to serve as a hospital ship and troop transport in World War I.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥林匹克号与其他船发生过两次相撞事件，但接着仍然在第一次世界大战中充当了医疗船和军队运输船。

sense_info_list.en: put up with something or somebody unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: A reasonable assumption—don't families struggle to avoid nursing homes and <highlight>suffer</highlight> real guilt if they can't?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个合理的假设——难道家庭不是在努力避免疗养院吗？如果无法避免，难道不是会遭受真正的负罪感吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: experience or be subjected to something bad or unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: With no rains for over a year, the city is <highlight>suffering</highlight> from unusually hot weather.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于一年多没有下雨，这座城市正遭受着异常炎热的天气。

examination_example.sentence: Whether we've been <highlight>suffer</highlight> from, lied to, misled, or cheated on, there are different levels of losing trust.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论我们遭受了什么，是被偷、被骗、被误导还是被背叛，（我们）都不同程度地丧失了信任。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: experience or be subjected to something bad or unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: The sea animals <highlight>suffer</highlight> (遭受) a lot and so do we humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海洋动物遭受了很多，我们人类也一样。

examination_example.sentence: Some areas where New Story wants to build houses <highlight>suffer</highlight> from earthquakes, so Icon's houses have been designed to hold up in earthquake conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在设计上，Icon的房子可以抗得过地震。

examination_example.sentence: Smile Train is a charity (慈善团体) that helps the millions of children around the world, who <highlight>suffer</highlight> from a facial defect (缺陷).
examination_example.sentence_trans: “微笑列车”是一个慈善机构，旨在帮助世界各地数百万患有面部缺陷的儿童。

sample.mean: n. 后缀；词尾
v. 授予；商议；协商；讨论；交流意见
v. 不同；相异；意见不同
v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚
v. 提供；给予

v. 提到；谈到；指；提交…做出决定；进行处理；把…归因于；淘汰；参考；查阅；让…注意
